text:
Q: Shape intersection design A:

It isn't quite clear how a statically dispatched system would be more useful than one with runtime based polymorphism. For example, read a list of shapes, find any pairwise intersections. How would you do that with static dispatch?

Q: <img> does not show image from NAS drive A:

The issue is that you are mixing up a server-side file path with a public web URL.

PHP runs on the server, so getimagesize("/Volumes/...") works perfectly because it has direct access to the file system.

However, the HTML <img src...> tag is parsed by the client's browser. When the browser sees /Volumes/..., it tries to request that path relative to your web server's root (e.g., http://192.168.x.x/Volumes/...). Since /Volumes is a system mount point located outside your public web folder (usually /var/www/html), Apache blocks it and returns a 404 Not Found.

To fix this, you need to tell Apache to map a URL to that NAS location using an Alias. . Update your Apache config (usually in /etc/apache2/sites-enabled/000-default.conf):

Apache

<VirtualHost *:80>
    # ... existing config ...

    # Map the URL "/nas" to the file system path
    Alias /nas /Volumes/Bilder/Test

    <Directory "/Volumes/Bilder/Test">
        Require all granted
    </Directory>
</VirtualHost>

2. Restart Apache: sudo service apache2 restart

3. Update your PHP: Change the src to use the new URL alias instead of the system path.

PHP

// Browser will now request http://[ip]/nas/P1020368.JPG
print('<img src="/nas/P1020368.JPG" alt="testimage">');

Q: How to display a column of dynamic length while being compatible with insert + shift down A:

my interim solution is to use a custom function with a Y-combinator pattern to find the first blank cell below a cell

You don't need to find the first blank cell to copy a whole column.

To copy a column, use an { array expression }. Put this in cell B1:

={ A:A }

If you don't want to copy any blank cells, use tocol(), like this:

=tocol(A:A, 1)

See tocol().

Q: How do I access Apple's AASA validator (App Search API Validation Tool)? A:

I can’t recall since when or why, but I have been using the following successfully:

https://app-site-association.cdn-apple.com/a/v1/<domain>

e.g.

https://app-site-association.cdn-apple.com/a/v1/spotify.com

Q: Error 20 at 0 depth lookup: unable to get local issuer certificate for self signed PostgreSQL when run from outside docker A:
  • Fixed the issue, the root.crt inside the express_server and postgres_server container was not the same as the one copied to the local machine after the containers started running. Thank you for taking your time to read this 🙏
